Summary: Huge object moving with a buzz-like roar from west to east slowly.
trends: There have been no other sightings in West Carson
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI'll keep this short, because I doubt you'll accept it without my name. Just before 11 p.m. in the evening, I heard a tremendous buzzing or roaring sound. Running out, I saw a huge dirigible like craft moving from west to east. Though it resembled a blimp, it was quite unlike any blimp I have ever seen, and much larger. The roar was incredible. It continued moving from west to east until it was out of sight. NOTE: I have checked "approximate" time, but it was very, very close. It couldn't be off by more than 4-5 minutes.
